Zum Face Gentle Facial Soap Bar

Brand: Zum

Category: Bar Soap

Ingredients: SAPONIFIED COCONUT, OLIVE AND PALM OILS, ESSENTIAL OILS, MEADOWFOAM SEED OIL, SHEA BUTTER EXTRACT, GOAT'S MILK, ALOE VERA, CASTOR OIL.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions
